axiom_1: Every phenomenon reduces to {dimension, primitive, planes, operations} before composition.
axiom_2: Same primitives recur across scales: quantum ↔ molecular ↔ cellular ↔ organ ↔ social ↔ cultural.
axiom_3: Strings/bridges are transitions between dimensions (projection, resonance, closure).
axiom_4: 5D = 0 provides identity background; 0D–4D are local perturbations on this field.
axiom_5: All interfaces (human/AI) must expose a reduction trace for auditability.
